author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Pierre Smits "Improve configuration options for Search/Find screens in project mgr." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6162 part of "Improve configurability of OFBiz regarding multi-tenancy" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-6164
In a multi-tenant setup configuration of the number of rows returned as well as the show the result on accessing a search find screens in project mgr needs to be configurable per tenant.

author: jleroux
